articles.title: Wholesale gas prices fall as Europe's plan to avert winter energy crisis takes shape - The Guardian

articles.title: Energy crisis: UK households worst hit in western Europe, finds IMF - The Guardian
articles.description: Heavy reliance on gas is behind price surge, with the impact on poorest households also the worst in Europe
articles.content: The energy crisis is hitting UK household budgets harder than any country in western Europe, according to analysis by the International Monetary Fund. The difference between the cost burden on poor a… [+5948 chars]

articles.title: Webb telescope captures ‘Phantom Galaxy’ in dazzling detail - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: The James Webb space telescope has revealed dazzling new detail of a slice of the cosmos 32 million light-years away in a new picture released by NASA and the European Space Agency (ESA).
